CustomField.description: This checkbox is checked by an After Save Flow when an Affiliation is created or updated where Status = Current Org Account = EDF Board of Trustees EDAF Board Environmental Defense Fund Europe Board
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox is checked by an After Save Flow. When an affiliation is created or updated where the Organization is = EDF Board or Committee and Status = Current, the corresponding Contact is updated.
CustomField.label: Active EDF Board Member
